stuffing as you go only stuff slightly the arms do not over stuff the arms head &body working in spiral using green yarn round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 6 increase 12 sts round 3 single_crochet in the next st increase x 6 18 sts round 4 2sc in the next 2 st increase x 6 24 sts round 5 3 single_crochet in the next 3 st increase x 6 30 sts round 6 4sc in the next 4st increase x 6 36 sts round 7 5sc in the next 4st increase x 6 42 sts round 8 blo 42 single_crochet round 9-13 42 single_crochet chang to red round 14-15 42 single_crochet chang to green round 16-21 42 single_crochet round 22 5sc in the next 4st decrease x 6 30 sts round 23 4sc in the next 4st decrease x 6 30 sts round 24 3 single_crochet in the next 3st decrease x 6 24 sts round 25 2 single_crochet in the next 2 st decrease x 6 18 sts round 26 single_crochet in the next st decrease x 6 12 sts round 27 6 decrease 6 sts fasten_off arms make 2 working in spiral start with skin color yarn round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 single_crochet in the next st increase x 3 9 sts round 3 9sc change to red 8 |by t h r ea d y a r ns round 4-5 9sc change to green round 6-12 9sc round 13 single_crochet in the next st decrease x 3 6 sts round 14 fold in half 2 single_crochet fasten_off leave yarn tail to sew to the body nose
